snippet: Manchester City, the defending champion, fell further out of title contention in the Premier League with a 2-1 loss at Crystal Palace that dropped City to fourth place.
abstract: Crystal Palace beats Manchester City, 2-1, pushing defending champion further out of title contention in Premier League soccer; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Manchester City, the defending champion, fell further out of title contention in the Premier League with a 2-1 loss at Crystal Palace that dropped City to fourth place.

headline.main: Manchester City’s Title Hopes Fade Further
headline.print_headline: Manchester City’s Title Hopes Fade Further
